# @liquify/path-resolve

This package is available on the npm registry exclusively for [@liquify](#) modules.

# Usage

```js
const { $ } = require("@liquify/path-resolve");

export default {
  input: $`extension/index.js`,
  output: {
    file: $`package/index.js`,
    format: "cjs",
  },
};
```
